Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended annually in two business improvement districts.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended annually in two business improvement districts.

Items.Title: Block 2396, Lots 21, 24, 25, 26, and 27; Block 2409, Lots 8, 9, 11, 15, and 27; Block 2420, Lot 41; Block 2434, Lot 8, Brooklyn, Community District No. 1, Council District No. 34
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Block 2396, Lots 21, 24, 25, 26, and 27; Block 2409, Lots 8, 9, 11, 15, and 27; Block 2420, Lot 41; Block 2434, Lot 8, Brooklyn, Community District No. 1, Council District No. 34.

Items.Title: Resolution approving the new designation and changes in the designation of certain organizations to receive funding in the Expense Budget.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Approving the new designation and changes in the designation of certain organizations to receive funding in the Expense Budget.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended annually in two business improvement districts.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended annually in two business improvement districts.

Items.Title: Resolution approving the new designation and changes in the designation of certain organizations to receive funding in the Expense Budget.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Approving the new designation and changes in the designation of certain organizations to receive funding in the Expense Budget.

Items.Title: Block 2396, Lots 21, 24, 25, 26, and 27; Block 2409, Lots 8, 9, 11, 15, and 27; Block 2420, Lot 41; Block 2434, Lot 8, Brooklyn, Community District No. 1, Council District No. 34
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be P-C Item Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution approved by Roll Call.
